name: Shreyas
headerTaglineOne: Hello There! yes that was a Star-Wars reference and welcome to my website :)
headerTaglineTwo:
My name is Shreyas, but you can call me Rey.
I am a Software Engineer and Entrepreneur dedicated to supporting the mental health community.
headerTaglineThree: I am also a Lead Guitarist with a passion for rock music and an unshakable love for Linkin Park.
aboutpara: Growing up in Singapore, my journey in technology and engineering has been shaped by friends and mentors whose innovative spirit and inspiring ideas, combined with my diverse experiences, have driven me to harness technology for societal impact. My fascination with technology emerged in childhood, particularly with solutions that prioritize exceptional design and user experience. This passion was further fueled by my admiration of Apple's approach to technology â€“ where engaging, simple, and secure user experiences take center stage in their products. Now, I'm applying my expertise in software engineering and large-scale data systems to develop a platform addressing critical mental healthcare challenges, specifically targeting prohibitive costs, social stigma, and limited access to immediate professional support. This project embodies my vision of creating meaningful social impact through thoughtfully designed solutions.

volunteering.title: Calm Collective Asia: Mental Health Facilitator Traniee
volunteering.description: I am currently a Calm Collective Asia scholarship recipient undergoing training as a mental health care facilitator and community peer supporter. My mission is to assist individuals across asia facing severe psychological challenges, offering support to help them navigate the difficult times associated with their mental health conditions.

volunteering.title: NUS Toastmasters Club
volunteering.description: Organised events to help individuals at NUS to improve their public speaking skills and improve their confidence while meeting new people.

volunteering.title: NUS Indian Cultural Society
volunteering.description: Vice-Publicity Head, assisted in the photography and media during events such as Deepavali and Holi during my Freshman Year of College.

volunteering.title: NUS Community Service Club
volunteering.description: Collaborated with friends to help special needs children in Singapore and attend to them when they wanted company or somebody to play around with :)
